All Classes

Class Description
ArcMode
Determines how an arc will be displayed.
Bounds2
An axis aligned bounding box (AABB) for a 2D area, represented with a minimum and maximum coordinate.
Bounds3
An axis aligned bounding box (AABB) for a 3D volume, represented with a minimum and maximum coordinate.
CamEntity2
An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.
CamEntity3
An entity which updates a renderer's camera according to its transform.
CamZup
The main class of this library.
Color
A mutable, extensible color class.
Color.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of color easing functions.
Color.ChannelOrder
Order in which to arrange color channels when flattening color to an array.
Color.ComparatorBri
Compares two colors by brightness.
Color.ComparatorHsb
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of HSB comparators.
Color.ComparatorHue
Compares two colors by hue.
Color.ComparatorSat
Compares two colors by saturation.
Color.HueCCW
Eases the hue in the counter-clockwise direction.
Color.HueCW
Eases between hues in the clockwise direction.
Color.HueEasing
An abstract parent class for hue easing functions.
Color.HueFar
Eases between hues by the farthest clockwise direction.
Color.HueNear
Eases between hues by the nearest clockwise direction.
Color.LerpRgba
Eases between two colors.
Color.MixHsba
Eases between colors by hue, saturation and brightness.
Color.SmoothStepRgba
Eases between two colors with the smooth step formula: t2 ( 3.0 - 2.0 t ) .
ColorKey
Stores a color at a given step (or percent) in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
ColorKey.SortQuantized
The default comparator used to compare color keys.
Complex
A two-dimensional complex number.
Complex.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of complex numbers.
Convert
Facilitates conversions between core objects and Processing objects.
Curve
An abstract parent for curve objects.
Curve2
Organizes a 2D cubic Bezier curve into a list of knots.
Curve2.Easing
An easing function to facilitate animation between multiple curves.
Curve3
Organizes a 3D cubic Bezier curve into a list of knots.
Curve3.Easing
An easing function to facilitate animation between multiple curves.
CurveEntity2
An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of curves.
CurveEntity3
An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of curves.
Edge2
Organizes components of a 2D mesh into an edge with an origin and destination.
Edge3
Organizes components of a 3D mesh into an edge with an origin and destination.
Entity
An entity to be drawn by a renderer, typically holding a transform and some other kind of data.
Entity2
An entity in two dimensional space that can be moved around with a transform, but contains no other data.
Entity3
An entity in three dimensional space that can be moved around with a transform, but contains no other data.
EntityData
An abstract parent class for data held by an entity.
Experimental
Indicates classes and methods that are brittle, experimental, works in progress, or not intended for robust public access.
Face2
Organizes components of a 2D mesh into a list of vertices that form a face.
Face2.Edge2Iterator
An iterator, which allows a face's edges to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
Face2.Vert2Iterator
An iterator, which allows a face's vertices to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
Face3
Organizes components of a 3D mesh into a list of vertices that form a face.
Face3.Edge3Iterator
An iterator, which allows a face's edges to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
Face3.Vert3Iterator
An iterator, which allows a face's vertices to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
Generative
Facilitates simplex noise and voronoi patterns via hashing functions.
Gradient
A mutable, extensible class that contains a list of keys which hold colors at steps in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
Handedness
Tracks the chirality, or handedness, of a 3D renderer.
ICamEntity
Maintains consistent behavior between camera entities.
ICurve
Maintains consistent behavior for curves of different dimensions.
IEntity
Maintains consistent behavior between entities.
IEntityData
Maintains consistent behavior between data contained by entities.
ImageEntity2
A convenience to create image planes.
ImageEntity3
A convenience to create image planes.
IMaterial
Maintains consistent behavior between different kind of materials, which store color and other display style information.
IMesh
Maintains consistent behavior for meshes of different dimensions.
Img
An experimental class to store image data.
Img.ImgIterator
An iterator, which allows a image's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
IOriented2
Maintains consistent behavior for 2D objects that can be rotated.
IOriented3
Maintains consistent behavior for 3D objects that can be rotated.
ISpatial2
Maintains consistent behavior for 2D animated objects that move in space.
ISpatial3
Maintains consistent behavior for 3D animated objects that move in space.
ISvgWritable
Maintains consistent behavior between classes which support creation of an SVG file.
ITextDisplay
Maintains consistent behavior between renderers which display text to the screen.
ITextDisplay2
Maintains consistent behavior between 2D renderers which display text to the screen.
ITextDisplay3
Maintains consistent behavior between 3D renderers which display text to the screen.
IUp
Maintains consistent behavior across renderers in the CamZup library.
IUp3
Maintains consistent behavior across 3D renderers that extend different branches of PGraphics.
IUpOgl
Maintains consistent behavior across OpenGL renderers, even when they are of different dimensions.
IUtils
Holds mathematical constants used by the rest of the library.
IVolume
Maintains consistent behavior between objects with volume.
IVolume2
Maintains consistent behavior between 2D objects with volume.
IVolume3
Maintains consistent behavior between 3D objects with volume.
IYup2
Maintains consistent behavior across 2D renderers that extend different branches of PGraphics, such as PGraphics2D and PGraphicsJava2D.
Knot2
Organizes the vectors the shape a Bezier curve into a coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).
Knot2.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of knot easing functions.
Knot2.Lerp
A functional class to ease between two knots with linear interpolation.
Knot3
Organizes the vectors the shape a Bezier curve into a coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).
Knot3.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of knot easing functions.
Knot3.Lerp
A functional class to ease between two knots with linear interpolation.
KtClr
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for colors.
KtClr.ClrIterator
An iterator, which allows a color's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
KtComplex
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for complex numbers.
KtMat3
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for three dimensional matrices.
KtMat3.M3Iterator
An iterator, which allows a matrix's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
KtMat4
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional matrices.
KtMat4.M4Iterator
An iterator, which allows a matrix's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
KtQuat
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for quaternions.
KtVec2
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for two dimensional vectors.
KtVec2.V2Iterator
An iterator, which allows a vector's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
KtVec3
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for three dimensional vectors.
KtVec3.V3Iterator
An iterator, which allows a vector's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
KtVec4
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional vectors.
KtVec4.V4Iterator
An iterator, which allows a vector's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
Mat3
A mutable, extensible class influenced by GLSL, OSL and Processing's PMatrix2D.
Mat4
A mutable, extensible class influenced by GLSL, OSL and Processing's PMatrix3D.
Material
Holds data that governs how an entity is displayed by a renderer.
MaterialPImage
A material which supports PImages as textures.
MaterialSolid
A material which holds data to display materials with solid colors only (no textures, or patterns).
MaterialUv
A material which holds data to display textured materials.
Mesh
An abstract parent for mesh objects.
Mesh.SortQuantized2
Compares two vectors by their quantized y component, then by their x component.
Mesh.SortQuantized3
Compares two vectors by their quantized z component, y component, then by their quantized x component.
Mesh2
Organizes data needed to draw a two dimensional shape using vertices and faces.
Mesh2.Face2Iterator
An iterator, which allows a mesh's faces to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
Mesh3
Organizes data needed to draw a three dimensional shape with vertices and faces.
Mesh3.CubeUvProfile
Enumerates which texture (UV) coordinate pattern to use when creating a cube.
Mesh3.Face3Iterator
An iterator, which allows a mesh's faces to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.
MeshDirect
A lower level version of the Mesh class intended for use with JOGL.
MeshEntity2
An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of meshes.
MeshEntity3
An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of meshes.
NormalMode
Duplicates and clarifies the normal mode options available to Processing's OpenGL renderers (P2D and P3D).
Octree
Partitions space to improve collision and intersection tests.
PathCommand
Command that describes how to render a path in the d attribute of a path node in scalable vector graphics (SVG).
PMatAux
The PMatrix class is marked final and hence cannot be extended and augmented.
PolyType
The type of polygon, or face, produced by a mesh function.
Quadtree
Partitions space to improve collision and intersection tests.
Quaternion
A four-dimensional complex number.
Quaternion.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Quaternions.
Quaternion.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of quaternion easing functions.
Quaternion.Lerp
A functional class to ease between two quaternions by linear interpolation (lerp).
Quaternion.Slerp
A functional class to ease between two quaternions by spherical linear interpolation (slerp).
Ray2
A direction that extends from an originating point.
Ray2.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Ray2 s.
Ray3
A direction that extends from an originating point.
Ray3.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Ray2 s.
Recursive
Indicates methods that are recursive and may result in Stack Overflow if improperly escaped.
Rng
A convenience for working in the Processing IDE: extends Random so an additional import does not need to be added.
Sdf
Facilitates implicit shapes created with signed distance fields.
Simplex
A simplex noise class created with reference to "Simplex noise demystified" by Stefan Gustavson.
SortLoops2
Compares two face indices (an array of vertex indices) by averaging the vectors referenced by them, then comparing the averages.
SortLoops3
Compares two face indices (an array of vertex indices) by averaging the vectors referenced by them, then comparing the averages.
TextEntity2
A convenience to create billboards which present text strings as a single image texture.
TextEntity3
A convenience to create billboards which present text strings as a single image texture.
TextShape
Converts AWT font glyphs to curves or meshes.
TextureSampling
Duplicates and clarifies the texture sampling options available to Processing's OpenGL renderers (P2D and P3D).
Transform2
Facilitates 2D affine transformations for entities.
Transform2.Easing
An easing function to facilitate animating multiple transforms.
Transform3
Facilitates 3D affine transformations for entities.
Transform3.Easing
An easing function to facilitate animation between multiple transforms.
TransformOrder
The order in which affine transformations -- translation, rotation, scale -- are applied.
Up3
An abstract parent class for 3D renderers.
UpOgl
An abstract parent class for Processing renderers based on OpenGL.
Utils
Implements basic math utilities for single-precision numbers.
Utils.EasingFuncArr<T>
A functional interface for an easing function which interpolates an an array.
Utils.EasingFuncObj<T>
A functional interface for an easing function which interpolates an object from an origin to a destination by a float, with a final output parameter.
Utils.EasingFuncPrm<T>
A functional interface for an easing function which interpolates a primitive data type from an origin to a destination by a float.
Utils.Lerp
Linear interpolation for a value.
Utils.LerpCCW
Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the counter-clockwise direction.
Utils.LerpCW
Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the clockwise direction.
Utils.LerpFar
Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the farthest direction.
Utils.LerpNear
Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the nearest direction.
Utils.LerpUnclamped
Linear interpolation, not clamped, for a value.
Utils.PeriodicEasing
An abstract class to cover the easing periodic of values, such as angles and hues in HSV color space.
Utils.QuadFunction<T,​U,​V,​W,​R>
A functional interface for functions with four input parameters.
Utils.SmoothStep
Eases between two values by a smooth step.
Utils.TriFunction<T,​U,​V,​R>
A functional interface for functions with three input parameters.
Vec2
A mutable, extensible class influenced by GLSL, OSL and Processing's PVector.
Vec2.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Vec2 s.
Vec2.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of vector easing functions.
Vec2.Lerp
A linear interpolation functional class.
Vec2.SmoothStep
Eases between two vectors with the smooth step formula: t2 ( 3.0 - 2.0 t ) .
Vec2.SortDistSq
Compares two vectors against a locus with squared Euclidean distance.
Vec2.SortX
Compares two vectors on the x axis.
Vec2.SortY
Compares two vectors on the y axis.
Vec3
A mutable, extensible class influenced by GLSL, OSL and Processing's PVector.
Vec3.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Vec3 s.
Vec3.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of vector easing functions.
Vec3.Lerp
A linear interpolation functional class.
Vec3.SmoothStep
Eases between two vectors with the smooth step formula: t2 ( 3.0 - 2.0 t ) .
Vec3.SortDistSq
Compares two vectors against a locus with squared Euclidean distance.
Vec3.SortX
Compares two vectors on the x axis.
Vec3.SortY
Compares two vectors on the y axis.
Vec3.SortZ
Compares two vectors on the z axis.
Vec4
A mutable, extensible class influenced by GLSL.
Vec4.AbstrComparator
An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Vec4 s.
Vec4.AbstrEasing
An abstract class to facilitate the creation of vector easing functions.
Vec4.Lerp
A linear interpolation functional class.
Vert2
Organizes the components of a 2D mesh into a group of coordinate and texture coordinate such that they can be edited together.
Vert3
Organizes the components of a 3D mesh into a group of coordinate, normal and texture coordinate such that they can be edited together.
Voronoi
Generates a Voronoi noise in two to four dimensions.
Yup2
A 2.5D renderer based on OpenGL.
Yup3
A 3D renderer where (0.0, 1.0, 0.0) is the default world up axis.
YupJ2
A 2D renderer based on the Java AWT (Abstract Window Toolkit).
ZImage
An extension of PImage, specializing in color gradients and blitting text to an image.
ZShader
Extends Processing's PShader to provide support for Cam Z-up core objects: Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Quaternion, Mat3 and Mat4.
Zup3
A 3D renderer where (0.0, 0.0, 1.0) is the default world up axis.
